arrow.description: Whether to show the arrow icon on the right side, also supports passing ReactNode to customize the icon.
arrow.description_zh: 是否在右侧显示箭头图标，也支持传递 ReactNode 自定义图标。

children.description: The main content area in the middle of the list item.
children.description_zh: 列表项中间的主要内容区域。

clickable.default: Defaults to true when the onClick prop is present, otherwise defaults to false

description.description: The description area in the lower middle of the list item.
description.description_zh: 列表项中下角的说明区域。

extra.description: The right area of the list item.

prefix.description: The left area of the list item.

title.description: The title area in the upper middle of the list item.
title.description_zh: 列表项中上角的标题区域。

events.name: onClick
events.description: The click event of the list item. When the onClick property is set, the list item will have click effect.
events.description_zh: 列表项的 click 事件。设置 onClick 属性后，列表项将具有单击效果。
